pp2.1:1.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo kālena kālaṁ samayena samayaṁ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
pp2.1:1.2_1: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—
pp2.1:2.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo na heva kho kālena kālaṁ samayena samayaṁ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
pp2.1:2.2_1: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—
pp2.1:3.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ.
pp2.1:3.3_0: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:3.4_0: na yatthicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ yāvaticchakaṁ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
pp2.1:3.5_1: yaṁ tassa puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyuṁ—
pp2.1:4.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ.
pp2.1:4.3_0: So ca kho nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:4.5_0: Aṭṭhānametaṁ anavakāso yaṁ tassa puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyuṁ—
pp2.1:5.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ.
pp2.1:5.3_0: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:5.4_0: na yatthicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ yāvaticchakaṁ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
pp2.1:5.5_1: yaṁ so puggalo pamādamāgamma tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyya—
pp2.1:6.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ.
pp2.1:6.3_0: So ca kho nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:6.5_0: Aṭṭhānametaṁ anavakāso yaṁ so puggalo pamādamāgamma tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyya—
pp2.1:7.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ.
pp2.1:7.3_0: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:7.4_0: na yatthicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ yāvaticchakaṁ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
pp2.1:7.5_0: Sace anusañceteti, na parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi.
pp2.1:7.6_0: Sace na anusañceteti, parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi—
pp2.1:8.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ.
pp2.1:8.3_0: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:8.4_0: na yatthicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ yāvaticchakaṁ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
pp2.1:8.5_0: Sace anurakkhati, na parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi.
pp2.1:8.6_0: Sace na anurakkhati, parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi—
pp2.1:9.3_0: na ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya paṭipanno—
pp2.1:10.2_0: Yesaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti tehi dhammehi samannāgato—
pp2.1:11.2_0: Satta sekkhā bhayūparatā, ye ca puthujjanā sīlavanto.
pp2.1:12.2_0: Ye te puggalā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā, kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā, vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā,
pp2.1:12.2_2: abhabbā niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ—
pp2.1:13.2_0: Ye te puggalā na kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā,
pp2.1:13.2_4: bhabbā niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ—
pp2.1:14.2_0: Pañca puggalā ānantarikā, ye ca micchādiṭṭhikā niyatā, aṭṭha ca ariyapuggalā niyatā.
pp2.1:16.2_0: Yassa puggalassa apubbaṁ acarimaṁ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca—
pp2.1:17.2_2: neva tāva kappo uḍḍayheyya yāvāyaṁ puggalo na sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchikaroti.
pp2.1:22.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati;
pp2.1:22.3_0: tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti, balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ—
pp2.1:23.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati;
pp2.1:23.3_0: na ca tattha sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti, na ca balesu vasībhāvaṁ—
pp2.1:24.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;
pp2.1:24.3_0: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—
pp2.1:25.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;
pp2.1:25.3_0: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.1:26.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;
pp2.1:26.3_0: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.1:27.3_0: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā.
pp2.1:27.4_0: Paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—
pp2.1:28.3_0: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā.
pp2.1:28.4_0: Paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti,
pp2.1:29.2_0: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa paññindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti,
pp2.1:29.4_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dhammānusārī phale ṭhito diṭṭhippatto.
pp2.1:30.2_0: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti,
pp2.1:30.4_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo saddhānusārī phale ṭhito saddhāvimutto.
pp2.1:31.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
pp2.1:31.3_0: So sattakkhattuṁ deve ca mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti—
pp2.1:32.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
pp2.1:32.3_0: So dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti—
pp2.1:33.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
pp2.1:33.3_0: So ekaṁyeva mānusakaṁ bhavaṁ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti—
pp2.1:34.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti,
pp2.1:34.2_1: sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti—
pp2.1:35.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti,
pp2.1:36.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti,
pp2.1:36.3_0: So upapannaṁ vā samanantarā appattaṁ vā vemajjhaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ ariyamaggaṁ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya—
pp2.1:37.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti,
pp2.1:37.3_0: So atikkamitvā vemajjhaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ upahacca vā kālakiriyaṁ ariyamaggaṁ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya—
pp2.1:38.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti,
pp2.1:38.3_0: So asaṅkhārena ariyamaggaṁ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya—
pp2.1:39.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti,
pp2.1:39.3_0: So sasaṅkhārena ariyamaggaṁ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya—
pp2.1:40.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti,
pp2.1:40.4_0: akaniṭṭhe ariyamaggaṁ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya—
pp2.1:41.1_0: Katamo ca puggalo sotāpanno sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno?
pp2.1:41.2_0: Tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.
pp2.1:42.1_0: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.
pp2.1:43.1_0: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ anavasesappahānāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.
pp2.1:44.1_0: Rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjāya anavasesappahānāya paṭipanno puggalo arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.
pp2.1:44.2_0: Yassa puggalassa rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṁ avijjā anavasesā pahīnā—
